page.title: 16Rodbourne Family Life
page.content: {Mrs. Vincent}lives at{Parsloe Farm {Rodbourne.}She has a son and a daughter and she helps on the farm. She has lived there ever since she has been married. They grow all their vegetables. The milk which Mrs. Vincent sometimes makes into cheese and butter comes from their own farm. Every evening and morning, it takes Mrs. Vincent 1 hour to feed the cats, dogs and calves. Their daughter goes to{Sheldon {Comprehensive School}in{Chippenham.} She has to cycle a mile to catch the bus to her school. Their son goes to{ {Seagry Controlled Primary School}and catches the bus outside their gate. The children belong to the{Young {Farmers Club,}it is where they learn about farming and take part in competitions.
